definitions.title: adj.gent.
definitions.body: ´[[הַמּ]] 1Ch 4:19; so [[הַמַּעֲכָתִי בֶּן־]] 2Sa 23:34 of one of David's heroes, We del. [[בן]]; rd. prob. ´[[בֵּיח הַמּ]] Klo HPS; v. also Dr; of associate of Ishmael the Judaean 2Ki 25:23 = Je 40:8; coll. = the Maachathites De 3:14, Jos 12:5, Jos 13:11, Jos 13:13 (all + [[הַגְּשׁוּרִי]]; cf. [[מַעֲכָה]]
).—LXX Max(e)i, Maxat(e)i, Maaxaqi, etc.
